reviews.name: John E Kristianson - Architect AIBC AAA
reviews.review: In 2011, I asked a professional colleague who best to provide electrician services for my custom residence in South Surrey. I was referred to Ray Bergmann who has since developed Innova Electrical Contracting and performed all work on my residence ranging from smaller to larger jobs. Ray is a credit to the electrical profession. Not only does he exhibit a high level of trade professionalism and skill, but he is personable. My wife, Karen, also a professional, has high standards. Ray easily meets these standards. As a professional I have access to a wide choice of electrical contractors. Ray has remained my #1 choice since 2011.

reviews.name: Pat Horahan - President NovaPak Paper Products Inc
reviews.review: NovaPak has been working closely with Ray Bergmann and Innova Electrical for several years now for our requirements for electrical services. From replacing all of our warehouse lighting, wiring up new machinery and assisting us with our power factors, I have found Ray and Innova to be excellent for quality of work and level of service. Ray delivers great work, all with a friendly smile and a fair price. I highly recommend Ray and Innova Electrical to any business in need of a qualified electrician.

reviews.name: Derek Hawryluk - DH Media
reviews.review: I was having some issues with my rental property and was referred to Ray at Innova Electrical from an old friend.  He came up with some great solutions to my issue.  Ray was very efficient and professional.  Would definitely use again!
